name: BASE 07 (Diamond Wolf) (Diamond Wolf) (Diamond Wolf)
description:
The whole game action is on the planet Mars. Mission is to clear the planet from aliens, You will have to fight the infinity alone, Upgrade base,Upgrade Spaceship to become Undefeated

Control

W-UP

S-Down

Mouse_left-Shoot

Mouse_right-Default Ammo/Infinity Ammo

Q,E,R,A,D-Use items
